message.content:
Breakfast:
- 1 cup whole grain oatmeal cooked with 1/2 cup almond milk and topped with 1/2 cup blueberries, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, and a drizzle of honey.
- A side of scrambled egg whites seasoned with salt and pepper.
- A glass of fresh orange juice.

Lunch:
- A mixed greens salad with spinach, romaine lettuce, arugula, topped with cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, bell peppers, and carrots. Dress with 2 tablespoons of olive oil-based vinaigrette.
- Grilled chicken breast (4 oz) seasoned with herbs and spices.
- A slice of whole grain bread topped with avocado and a squeeze of lemon juice.
- A side of mixed roasted vegetables such as sweet potatoes, Brussels sprouts, and zucchini.

Dinner:
- Baked salmon (4 oz) seasoned with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
- Quinoa tossed with sautéed garlic, onions, and bell peppers, garnished with fresh cilantro and a squeeze of lime juice.
- A side of steamed broccoli with a drizzle of sesame oil.

Snacks:
- An apple with a tablespoon of natural peanut butter.
- A handful of unsalted nuts or seeds (e.g., almonds, pistachios, walnuts, or sunflower seeds).
- A small container of Greek yogurt topped with chopped fruits and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
- A glass of water or herbal tea throughout the day to stay hydrated.

Remember to drink plenty of water, engage in physical activity, and get enough sleep for optimal health. This meal plan provides a balance of protein, carbohydrates, healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals that your body needs. Enjoy!
